# HTTPS Server Block (Port 443)
server {
    listen 443 ssl;
    server_name eldravideo.com www.eldravideo.com;

    # SSL Certificate Files
    ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/eldravideo.com/fullchain.pem;
    ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/eldravideo.com/privkey.pem;

    ssl_protocols TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3;
    ssl_prefer_server_ciphers on;
    ssl_ciphers HIGH:!aNULL:!MD5;

  #  client_max_body_size 1000M;

    location /uploads/ {
    alias /var/www/cvideo/uploads/;
    autoindex on;

   }
